org.jwebsocket.plugins.jmx

Class JMXPlugIn

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jwebsocket.plugins.BasePlugIn
      • org.jwebsocket.plugins.TokenPlugIn
        • org.jwebsocket.plugins.jmx.JMXPlugIn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jwebsocket.api.WebSocketPlugIn

    public class JMXPlugIn
extends org.jwebsocket.plugins.TokenPlugIn
    Main class of the module which takes care of creating the JMX infrastructure to use. Initializes all other components within the module.
    Author:
    Lisdey Pérez Hernández(lisdey89, UCI)
